subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : Both metal and non-metal exist in $\mathrm{p}$ and d-block elements. Statement (II) : Non-metals have higher ionisation enthalpy and higher electronegativity than the metals.
question_latex: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : Both metal and non-metal exist in $\mathrm{p}$ and d-block elements. Statement (II) : Non-metals have higher ionisation enthalpy and higher electronegativity than the metals.

options.text: (1) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
(2) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(3) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(4) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
